meanings.definition: To separate chaff from grain by blowing or agitation.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used a fan to chaffy the wheat after harvest.
meanings.sent2: She carefully chaffied the rice to remove any impurities.
meanings.sent3: The kids had fun chaffying the seeds in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The wind helped chaffy the leaves from the tree branches.
meanings.sent5: He chaffied the dirt from the potatoes before cooking them.
